Package entity

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Maze
  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Maze. Stores and creates a set of BarObstacle which make up a maze.
    Author:
    psyfb2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Maze()
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAllObstaclesToRoot​(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Displays all BarObstacles (excluding ghost bar obstacles) contained within the internal BarObstacle set.
      void addGhostObstacle​(BarObstacle o)
      Adds an invisible barObstacle which is intended to only be visible to ghosts
      void addObstacle​(BarObstacle o)
      Adds a BarObstacle to the internal BarObstacle Set
      void clearObstacles()
      Clears internal barObstacle set and ghost barObstacle to contain no obstacles
      java.util.Set<BarObstacle> getObstacles()  
      java.lang.Boolean hasObstacle​(double fromX, double toX, double fromY, double toY)
      lets you know if there's an obstacle (including ghost barriers) between two coordinates
      java.lang.Boolean isTouching​(double x, double y, double padding)
      Checks if a point is touching any of the obstacles (excluding ghost bar obstacles) which make up the maze
      boolean isTouchingIncludingGhostBarriers​(double x, double y, double padding)
      Checks if a point is touching any of the obstacles (including ghost bar obstacles) which make up the maze

    • Method Detail

      • isTouching

        public java.lang.Boolean isTouching​(double x,
                                    double y,
                                    double padding)
        Checks if a point is touching any of the obstacles (excluding ghost bar obstacles) which make up the maze
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        padding - number of pixels to pad around the given coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the point is touching any obstacles, else false

      • isTouchingIncludingGhostBarriers

        public boolean isTouchingIncludingGhostBarriers​(double x,
                                                double y,
                                                double padding)
        Checks if a point is touching any of the obstacles (including ghost bar obstacles) which make up the maze
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        padding - number of pixels to pad around the given coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the point is touching any obstacles, else false

      • hasObstacle

        public java.lang.Boolean hasObstacle​(double fromX,
                                     double toX,
                                     double fromY,
                                     double toY)
        lets you know if there's an obstacle (including ghost barriers) between two coordinates
        Parameters:
        fromX - x1 coordinate
        toX - x2 coordinate
        fromY - y1 coordinate
        toY - y2 coordinate
        Returns:
        true if there is an obstacle between (x1, y1) (x2, y2), else false

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        o - BarObstacle to add

      • addAllObstaclesToRoot

        public void addAllObstaclesToRoot​(javafx.scene.Group root)

        Parameters:
        root - Root

      • clearObstacles

        public void clearObstacles()
